summary: An aspiring dancer and her wicked sisters resent their mother's love for a foster daughter.
cast: Brock Peters|Claudia McNeil|Leslie Uggams|Louise Stubbs|Peggy Pettit|Gloria Edwards|Rhetta Greene|Ruby Dee|Kent Martin|Gertrude Jeannette|Carl Byrd|Damu King|Erik Kilpatrick|Morris Buchanan|Bob Harris|Brunetta Barnett|Gina Beharry|Cason Cunningham|Gloria Delaney|Maurice Jackson|Carole Lamond|Aly Ma|Dolores Porter|Adrian Richards|Kathy Sims|Susan Spell|Nathaniel Taylor|Eddie Crawford|Eugene Jackson|Henry Kingi
title: Black Girl
